addPaperReview(uint32,uint32,string,stri.details: addPaperReview -  This function verify registered reviewer and verify paper existence. Then it allows to                       add the comment, status and cid hash file against the paper id.

params._paperid: Paper ID, or which reviewed data being added
params._reviewerCid: remarked document hash cid from IPFS
params._status: Status of the paper given by the reviewer e.g. passed , reject or resubmit.
params._version: Paper version, for which reviewed data being added

addReviewerInterestedInKeyword(bytes32).details: addReviewerInterestedInKeyword - add the new caller as a reviewer if he is not enrolled to this keyword before m, otherwise reject him if he is already a part of this keyword

params._keyword: a single keyword to be added under reviewer's interest group

constructor.details: the constructor simply gets the author contract address and store it in the authors contract object.      this address is later used for initializing the author contract.

params._paperContractAddress: must be the existing deployed paper contract address
params._userContractAddress: must be the existing deployed Author contract address

getAllReviewerInterestedInKeyword(bytes3.details: getAllReviewerInterestedInKeyword - get all those reviewers whose interest is in this following keyword
getAllReviewerInterestedInKeyword(bytes3.return: address[]  reviewers   list of reviewers who are interested in the given keywork

getPaperReview(uint32,uint32).details: getPaperReview -  get the reviewing data based on the paper and paper's version.

params._version: Paper version , the targetted version of the paper

getPaperReview(uint32,uint32).return: _reviewerComments   complete comments_reviewerCid        remarked document hash cid from IPFS_reviewer        remarked document hash cid from IPFS_status             Status of the paper given by the reviewer e.g. passed , reject or resubmit.

isReviewerAlreadyAddedInKeywordList(byte.details: isReviewerAlreadyAddedInKeywordList - check the keyword list if it has already this new caller or not.
isReviewerAlreadyAddedInKeywordList(byte.return: bool       isexist     return true if keyword is already added under reviewer's address else false will return.

setPaperStatus(uint256,uint8).details: setPaperStatus - The inter-contract communication to a new status against the paper e.g. resubmit,  reject or passed.

params._status: Status e.g.   resubmit,  reject or passed.
